13  package net.sf.oval.internal.util;
14  
15  import static net.sf.oval.Validator.getCollectionFactory;
16  
17  import java.util.Map;
18  
19  /**
20   * @author Sebastian Thomschke
21   */
22  public class ThreadLocalMap<K, V> extends ThreadLocal<Map<K, V>>
23  {
24  	/**
25  	 * {@inheritDoc}
26  	 */
27  	@Override
28  	public Map<K, V> initialValue()
29  	{
30  		return getCollectionFactory().createMap();
31  	}
32  }
